Dexciss Technology focuses on Enterprise Software, Cloud Computing, CRM, Enterprise Resource Planning, and Supply Chain Management. Their company has offices in Pune and Indore. They have a small team that's between 11-50 employees.
You can view their website at http://www.dexciss.com or find them on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
